pli-tv-bi-vb-pc59:1.11.1: [Kd 20:9.4.18](pli-tv-kd20:9.4.18) makes it clear how this is supposed to happen. A group of two or three _bhikkhunīs_ should approach the Bhikkhu-sangha and ask for the date of the _uposatha_ and for when to come for the _ovāda_, if at all. The nuns are essentially finding out who is available for the _ovāda_ and when.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc59:2.4: For a discussion of the rendering “observance day (ceremony)” for _uposatha_, see Appendix I: Technical Terms.
